name: Dhamakedaar Safar
description:
A racing game we made in group of 4 people as university classmates for a unity workshop.

The template that was given was the Karting Microgame from unity asset store.

**Controls of the game**

  • Use "W" and "D" to accelerate/Decelerate car
  • Use Space to start drifting

**Credits**

  • Game Programmer: Nabarun Roy
  • Game Designer: Mahammad Saquib
  • Game Artist: Jitesh Kumar, Lobsang  Dhondup
